Title: Relates to requiring certain information to be provided as part of custody and support agreements
Summary: Requires parents to provide certain information as part of a custody and support agreement for the purpose of permitting a child to apply for financial aid for post secondary education.
LawCode: Amd ยง236, Dom Rel L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law, in relation to requiring parents to provide certain information as part of custody and support agreements
